_aChangeLog.text: Lowered all info_teleport_destination by 1 unit to better prevent telehopping
Changed all antipre gravity timings to better prevent telehopping
Fixed stamina and gravity checks
Fixed reverse climb room skip
Fixed obscure softlock near infinite fall room
Fixed possible skips on low gravity bhop twist rooms
Added more highlight overlays in various places
Improved contrast for kz blocks in various places
Fixed lighting inconsistency on curviture evolution room
Extended purple hint lines
Fixed music easter egg fade-in time
Added version tracking in the description on team join
Added safety checkpoint at third kz stage (jump to ladder)
Stamina check stage is now harder
Stage after stamina check is now easier
First stage in reverse climb room is now better aligned
360 degree cyan jump distance went from 284 to 290
Water bhop stage on diagonal symmetry level is now harder to skip on auto
Last jump on first low gravity bhop twist room is 16 units longer
Last jump on second low gravity bhop twist room is 32 units longer
First jump on last low gravity kz level is 4 units shorter
Second jump on last low gravity kz level is 2 units longer
Last jump at ladder stage on push reset level is 4 units shorter
Fix wall of text typo

_sText:
"Awe is the grail of artistic achievement"

A map 9 months in the making.
It is made for scroll.Â 
You WILL NOT be able to finish it on auto or low gravity.

Main route is very difficult, every stage was playtested and done by me and neko.
Bonus 1 is easy and can be played by anyone.
Bonus 2 is insanely hard, but theoretically possible.

  • When setting up zones on a timer, use !showtriggers to see where they should be placed.
  • This map was intended to be played WITHOUT cj macro. All 64 jumps are possible without it.
  • This map was designed with eventqueuefix in mind, do not use boosterfix as it is outdated.
  • This map was designed with no rngfix in mind. It will make kz slopes worse in some places.
  • This map was not compressed with bspzip because it caused game freezes on soundscape changes.
  • Avoid triggering round restart on a server, as it will cause a crash because of edicts limit. You will understand once you see the size of the map.

Track list is inside the bsp in case you need it.
